channel.title: Creators Log Launched Today
channel.description:
Hello all,
Launched a new project today: [Creators Log: A community of Creators][1]
Creators Log is a place for creators to document and share their product creation journey with others.
Been in the works a couple of month, but got on [Product Hunt][2] today.
Would love to know what everyone thinks of it.
Cheers, Mubs
[1]: http://creatorslog.com [2]: http://www.producthunt.com/tech/creators-log

item.title: Creators Log Launched Today
item.dc:creator: mubashariqbal
item.description:
Hello all,

Launched a new project today:
Creators Log: A community of Creators

Creators Log is a place for creators to document and share their product creation journey with others.

Been in the works a couple of month, but got on Product Hunt today.

Would love to know what everyone thinks of it.
